messages.author: satorux1
messages.text:
whoa. This is very uncool!

How hard would it be to add the necessary feature to 'base' so you don't need to use this? 

Alternatively, you could add the necessary feature in this file for now, and move it to 'base' later.

Either way, please avoid using gio.

messages.author: Seigo Nonaka
messages.text:
Sure, but please wait a while.
I will ping you again after new implementation is ready.

Thank you.
